entry.title: @Trans Pride Manchester see you there! to everyone who's thinking of coming, stay safe and stay hydrated. say hi if you see me! if you can't make it, please share/repost. and to my trans family - you matter and we will get through this 💜🏳️‍⚧️ #trans #pea
entry.content: @Trans Pride Manchester see you there! to everyone who's thinking of coming, stay safe and stay hydrated. say hi if you see me! if you can't make it, please share/repost. and to my trans family - you matter and we will get through this 💜🏳️‍⚧️ #trans #peacefulprotest #resist #transgender #transrights #transrightsarehumanrights #cisally #manchester #uk #staysafe #lgbt #lgbtq

entry.title: good luck to everyone in London for the protest today! looking forward to seeing folks at the @Trans Pride Manchester Protest on Sunday. We are loved, we are worthy 💜🏳️‍⚧️ #trans #transgender #protest #resist #exist #lgbt #allies
entry.content: good luck to everyone in London for the protest today! looking forward to seeing folks at the @Trans Pride Manchester Protest on Sunday. We are loved, we are worthy 💜🏳️‍⚧️ #trans #transgender #protest #resist #exist #lgbt #allies

entry.title: I don't know where I would have given birth if I could have trusted that I wouldn't have been misgendered in hospital. on reflection, perhaps I didn't truly have birth choices because hospital didn't feel like a choice for me. #birth #pregnancy #midwife
entry.content: I don't know where I would have given birth if I could have trusted that I wouldn't have been misgendered in hospital. on reflection, perhaps I didn't truly have birth choices because hospital didn't feel like a choice for me. #birth #pregnancy #midwife #baby #newborn #homebirth #hospital #waterbirth #trans #lgbtq #edi #inclusion #transgender #gender #intersectional #feminism

entry.title: Replying to @ali_wooxx of course women and mothers are women and mothers. nobody is taking away your words or your identity. if you have been wronged and had something taken from you, let me know and I'll ready the troops! we fight for autonomy and consen
entry.content: Replying to @ali_wooxx of course women and mothers are women and mothers. nobody is taking away your words or your identity. if you have been wronged and had something taken from you, let me know and I'll ready the troops! we fight for autonomy and consent in these parts. #consent #language #trans #gender #pregnancy #birth

entry.title: thank you for your thoughtful comments, I appreciate your kindness. I absolutely agree where the fear is coming from, but I strongly feel it's not only misdirected, but that the fear itself is being created through disinformation by people who want to uph
entry.content: thank you for your thoughtful comments, I appreciate your kindness. I absolutely agree where the fear is coming from, but I strongly feel it's not only misdirected, but that the fear itself is being created through disinformation by people who want to uphold patriarchy. trans people are not only a useful scapegoat, but the arguments used to harm us also harm cis women (e.g. that there's a "right way" to be a women, and others). I hope we can continue to build bridges between us and fight to change the system together #trans #gender #feminism #feminist #transpregnancy #lgbt #birth #pregnancy

entry.title: I felt like I was crying out to get support and all I received was rejection and misgendering. this broke me, and set the course for the most difficult time of my life (and I say this as someone who has escaped DV and been homeless) I am so privileged to
entry.content: I felt like I was crying out to get support and all I received was rejection and misgendering. this broke me, and set the course for the most difficult time of my life (and I say this as someone who has escaped DV and been homeless) I am so privileged to get to access therapy, it terrifies me what would have happened had I not found some way to get support. #trans #transpregnancy #perinatalmentalhealth #pregnant #pregnancy #mentalhealth #nhs #midwifery #pmh #cmht

entry.title: small things you can do: 1. like/share/repost this video (I'm donating anything I make on it to doctors without borders) 2. make a video with the filter - even if it's a private video 3. follow the filter creator for updates ♥️🖤💚🤍 #free #makeadifference
entry.content: small things you can do: 1. like/share/repost this video (I'm donating anything I make on it to doctors without borders) 2. make a video with the filter - even if it's a private video 3. follow the filter creator for updates ♥️🖤💚🤍 #free #makeadifference #peace #watermelonfilter #filterforgood #freepalestine🇵🇸❤️

entry.title: stay safe as we remember our dead. I especially want to mention that Black trans women are at the highest risk of violence. I say the names of all our sisters and siblings who have died this year. #tdor #transgender #dayofremembrance #trans #lgbtq
entry.content: stay safe as we remember our dead. I especially want to mention that Black trans women are at the highest risk of violence. I say the names of all our sisters and siblings who have died this year. #tdor #transgender #dayofremembrance #trans #lgbtq
